title: Asparagus with Cashew Cream

ingredients.content: 16 oz pencil-thin asparagus, cleaned and trimmed

preparations.content: Place cashews, water, orange juice and salt into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and blend a further <b>1 min/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place Varoma into position, weigh in asparagus and set aside.
Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10-12 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, until cooked through.
Arrange asparagus on a serving platter, drizzle with reserved Cashew Cream and garnish with chopped cashews. Serve warm.

hintsAndTricks: Garnish with orange segments or orange zest.
